name: List Settlements
description:
The Settlements API allows you fetch all your settlement history.

#### List Settlements

List all your business Settlements.

Endpoint: /settlement  
Method: GET

#### Header

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _authorization_ | string | Yes | Set value to _Bearer SECRET_KEY_ |

steps.name: Response has a status property of type boolean
Response has a message property of type string
Response has a data property which is an array
Response has a meta property which is an object
Meta object has a total property of type number
